values.name: Off
values.description: Soft Delete is turned off for the BackupVault

values.name: On
values.description: Soft Delete is enabled for the BackupVault but can be turned off

values.name: AlwaysOn
values.description: Soft Delete is permanently enabled for the BackupVault and the setting cannot be changed

state.description: Encryption state of the Backup Vault.

values.name: Enabled
values.description: CMK encryption is enabled on the Backup Vault

values.name: Disabled
values.description: CMK encryption is disabled on the Backup Vault. User can not set this state once Encryption State is 'Enabled'.

values.name: Inconsistent
values.description: CMK encryption is in inconsistent state on the Backup Vault. This state indicates that user needs to retry the encryption settings operation immediately to correct the state.
